sentences.en: 31 people have been injured in violent incidents throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 今天一天有31人在暴力事件中受伤。

sentences.en: A violent impact hurtled her forward.
sentences.cn: 中文例句: 一股剧烈的冲击力将她猛地向前抛了出去。

sentences.en: Civil disobedience, violent or non-violent, is intentional law breaking.
sentences.cn: 公民抗命，不管是暴力还是非暴力的，都是故意犯法。

sentences.en: He had a reputation for turning violent (= suddenly attacking people ).
sentences.cn: 大家都知道他会突然动粗。

sentences.en: I have a very short fuse and a violent temper.
sentences.cn: 我容易发怒，脾气暴躁。

sentences.en: It was the most violent film that I have ever seen.
sentences.cn: 这是我看过的最暴力的一部电影。

sentences.en: Larry began suffering severe headaches and violent mood swings.
sentences.cn: 拉里开始出现严重的头痛和剧烈的情绪波动。

sentences.en: Many cinema-goers were stunned by the film's violent and tragic end.
sentences.cn: 许多来看电影的人都被这部影片暴力而悲惨的结局所震惊。

sentences.en: My father was a violent and dangerous man.
sentences.cn: 我父亲脾气暴躁，是个危险人物。

sentences.en: She studied me warily, as if I might turn violent.
sentences.cn: 她警惕地看着我，似乎担心我会动粗。

sentences.en: Sometimes frustration and anger can boil over into direct and violent action.
sentences.cn: 有时挫折和愤怒会以直接的暴力形式爆发出来。

sentences.en: Statistically our chances of being the victims of violent crime are remote.
sentences.cn: 从统计数据来看，我们成为暴力犯罪受害者的可能性微乎其微。

sentences.en: The crowds became violent and threw petrol bombs at the police.
sentences.cn: 人群变得狂暴起来，并向警察投掷汽油弹。

sentences.en: the increase in violent crime
sentences.cn: 暴力犯罪的增多

sentences.en: The judiciary must think very hard before jailing non-violent offenders.
sentences.cn: 司法部在将非暴力犯罪者投入监狱前必须经过审慎的考虑。

sentences.en: The riots ended in the violent deaths of three teenagers.
sentences.cn: 动乱以三名少年的惨死而告终。

sentences.en: The signs suggest that the elections will be non-violent and fair.
sentences.cn: 种种迹象表明选举将会是非暴力的、公正的。

sentences.en: They are raking in the profits from each more audaciously violent movie.
sentences.cn: 通过一部部更加大胆的暴力电影，他们攫取了巨额利润。

sentences.en: They had a violent quarrel and John stormed out.
sentences.cn: 他们吵得很激烈，约翰气呼呼地冲了出去。

sentences.en: violent clashes between the police and demonstrators
sentences.cn: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.en: Violent crime has increased by 10 percent since last year.
sentences.cn: 暴力犯罪自去年以来增加了10%。

sentences.en: When his headaches developed Nick became bad-tempered and even violent.
sentences.cn: 尼克出现头痛时脾气就变得很差，甚至还会动粗。

sentences.en: When I first came here, I was very violent.
sentences.cn: 我刚来这儿的时候脾气非常暴躁。

words.tran_cn: 严峻的,不屈服的,痛苦的,不能容忍的,尖锐的,非凡的
强有力的,无拘束的,狂暴的,暴怒的,危险的
毁坏的,灾难的,荒芜的,有害的,致命的,残忍的,无情的,放肆的,凶暴的
热烈的,热情的,强烈的,疯狂的

trans.tran_cn: 暴力的，粗暴的，强烈的，剧烈的，鲜艳夺目的
trans.tran_en: involving actions that are intended to injure or kill people, by hitting them, shooting them etc
